pullrequest.title: Update pose frame proposal to support //xyz[@expressed_in]

content.raw:
Hm… If we have custom code, how hard would it be to do the kinematics? \(e.g. get the full frame graph?\)

If it’s not that hard, perhaps we just go that route, and defer introducing this new attribute unless it’s necessary?

Alternative is that I modify `Converter.cc` to always add some crazy \(obfuscated\) model frame name like `model_frame_from_sdf_converter` - if that element already exists, throw an error \(which seems tractable to have [Converter.cc](http://Converter.cc) do\)…
content.html:
Hm… If we have custom code, how hard would it be to do the kinematics? (e.g. get the full frame graph?)

If it’s not that hard, perhaps we just go that route, and defer introducing this new attribute unless it’s necessary?

Alternative is that I modify Converter.cc to always add some crazy (obfuscated) model frame name like model_frame_from_sdf_converter - if that element already exists, throw an error (which seems tractable to have Converter.cc do)…
